titleStmt.title: An exposition of the Creede, the Lords Prayer, the Tenne Commandements, and the Sacraments. Catechetically composed by Iohn Bristovv, minister of the Word of God
titleStmt.author: Bristow, John, minister of the word of God.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher] for Samuel Man, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A short catechisme, with a larger exposition.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
